attributes.action: Independently review into the Government’s handling of the COVID Pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: To hold the decision makers accountable for their actions and be better prepared for the next Pandemoc.
attributes.background: Begin an independent review into the Government’s handling of the Coronavirus Pandemic. Compare the UK’s actions to that of relevant countries that handled the situation far better with better outcomes specifically in total deaths and total deaths per million.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302576
